column5: This is the worst spring for rain I can remember. This weekend is looking so-so on Saturday and ~15mm more rain for Sunday. Oh and east winds for good measure. So now the forecast shows the possibility of rain for 5 of the next 7 days! In previous years, I'd ignore the rain forecasts but this year were getting it big time!! Here's hoping June is different.

Good luck. Hopefully your house etc is all good  We get it here often now, and it's rediculous.totally disrupts the fishing.  Water in 2014 here, was up 24ft. Yeah, sounds retarded, but it was darn near catastrophic stage  According to the water testing, that was the highest it was in like 98 years.

A farmer has around a 100 acre field behind my house, still no activity in it, they may get another real late start?  We had a spring like this a few years back, then June hit and it stopped raining, I like to see a little rain once or twice a week.
Can't work the ground while it is saturated. Got in 5 rows of peppers in the last week, but now I go back to waiting
